= ARM9 Compilation =

  # You need to get the last svn version of [http://pjsip.org pjsip].
  # You need to download the [http://svsip.googlecode.com/files/patch%20-%20pjsip-nds%20-%2020090305.txt.zip patch] for pjsip
  # Apply the patch
{{{
   patch -p0
}}}
  # Define in compile.sh the path of DEVKITPRO and DEVKITARM
  # compile
{{{
   ./compile.sh
}}}
